data.name: Bug Fables: The Art of Bugaria
data.detailed_description:
This digital artbook in PDF format contains over 150 pages of luscious art, history and lore from Bug Fables: The Everlasting Sapling, including the complete list of characters, NPCs, locales, artifacts, enemies, bosses and much, much more!

Learn the backstory of Bug Fables through developer notes for almost every named character, and unused concepts for environments and enemies. Sometimes even scrapped bosses or different versions of existing ones! (No, really, there's like 10 Spuders in there!)

Also contains the Hoaxe: Origins comic, detailing a major antagonist's backstory throughout a 20 page comic never seen before outside this artbook!

If you already own Bug Fables the game, you can get the artbook at 10% off!
